description: Query InfiniBand Subnet Management packets directly from nodes. Retrieves node info, port info, and switch forwarding tables. Essential for low-level fabric debugging.

installation.notes: Install via: apt install infiniband-diags or yum install infiniband-diags

common_usage_patterns.output_example:
NodeInfo:
   BaseVersion:............1
   ClassVersion:...........1
   NodeType:...............Channel Adapter
   NumPorts:...............2
   SystemImageGUID:........0x0002c903001f8c30
   NodeGUID:...............0x0002c903001f8c30
   PortGUID:...............0x0002c903001f8c31

PortInfo:
   LID:....................1
   state:..................Active
   physical state:.........LinkUp
   link width:.............4X
   link speed:.............HDR

error_messages.resolution: Verify LID is correct and node is reachable
Check query type and port number

interoperability.notes: SMP (Subnet Management Packets) provide direct access to node attributes. Query types: nodeinfo, nodedesc, portinfo, switchinfo, pkeytbl, sl2vl, vlarb, fdb, mfdb, guidinfo.

permissions.read_operations: No special permissions for basic queries
permissions.notes: Some queries may require SM access

limitations: Some queries only valid for switches

reads_from.description: Queries node and port attributes directly

consistent_with.shared_state: Port info matches local ibstat output
Node and port records match SA database
